name: Gods of Egypt: A Window Into Another World: Visual Effects
detailed_description: Take a peek behind the curtain at the process of putting all the visual effects elements together that complete Gods Of Egypt. We will showcase this visual virtuosity through VFX shot progressions to fully appreciate this filmmaking feat.
